name: ChilliChallenge
description:
IMPORTANT 

HOW TO PLAY: Try to eat as much hot Chicken wings as you can in only 1 minute, to achieve this, be sure to drink water and be careful with the spiciness. On the right, you'll see a leaderboard with the best players at the moment

CONTROLS :

Space bar: Eat

"A" key + "G" key at the same time: take a sip of water(every 20 sips of water you take, you'll reduce your spiciness bar)

Left Click: click or action.
